Question: On October 23, 1999, this person was involved in the crash of a Bell 206L4 LongRanger helicopter (N36R).
Hints: Star Wars became one of the most successful movies of all time worldwide, and established this person as a superstar.
In March 2004, this person officially became chairman of the Young Eagles program of the Experimental Aircraft Association (EAA).
This person has been in numerous other films, including Heroes (1977), Force 10 from Navarone (1978), and Hanover Street (1979).
